name: Saliva Kid
overview: Fast paced platform action also published in Magic Disk 64 1994/01. The old fairy tale of Hansel and Gretel is taken up again with this game. In a distant country, two children got lost playing and are now wandering helplessly. The player now has the task of finding the two lost friends. The journey leads through 32 levels. Hot desert sand, rain, snow and sea depths have to be mastered in order to bring the two poor children back into their world. To top it off, they have to assert themselves against robots in a futuristic techno world.
